html:
put it into the hand of them that afflict thee. The judgments that Israel has suffered at the hands of the unrighteous will be brought upon the unrighteous.

Bow down, that we may go over. In some ancient societies, the vanquished were forced to lie on the ground while the victor walked over them (Josh. 10:24; Ps. 110:1).

ground/street. These terms symbolize the depths of humiliation.
